headline: Assessing Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A) Valuation As Shares Track Modest Returns And Intrinsic Discount Estimates
summary: Why Berkshire Hathaway stock is catching investors' attention now Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A) shares have seen mixed performance recently, with a small 1 day decline and a roughly flat month, while total return over the past 3 months is slightly positive. See our latest analysis for Berkshire Hathaway. That small 1 day share price decline of 1.94% sits against a year to date share price return of 0.50%, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 5.93% reflects steadier long term momentum...
